entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: After acquiring all the parts, Majolnir made a speeder for me.
entries.journal_entry_description: Majolnir is helping me collect all the parts I need so that he can build me a speeder.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Majolnir said you should head out to the Tusken Zealot junktown to look for speeder parts.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: There's a speeder engine out here that I can bring back to use for my new speeder.
entries.task02_comm_message_text: That engine should be in pretty good working order, just needs some oil and a couple of touch ups. Now find yourself a power booster.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: I should search this junk and find a power booster.
entries.task04_comm_message_text: That'll do just fine. Now, you're going to need a steering array. There should be a good one out there somewhere. I'll send you a location where I think I saw a good one.
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: I need to search the junk around here and find a steering array.
entries.task06_comm_message_text: You've got the parts, I have an empty speeder body, new we need some wiring. There might be some wiring in the debris field over by...well, let me just send you a marker to it.
entries.task07_journal_entry_description: I should go look through the debris field for some good wiring.
entries.task08_comm_message_text: Yeah, that's the area. You'll need to find some nice shiny silver plated wiring. That debris field used to have some. I hope there's still some left around there somewhere.
entries.task09_journal_entry_description: I need to search this debris for some silver plated wiring.
entries.task10_journal_entry_description: You have all the pieces Majolnir needs to put together a speeder for you. Bring them back to him and let him put them together.
